title: OpenAI Announces GPT-5 with Reasoning Breakthroughs
summary: The latest model demonstrates unprecedented chain-of-thought capabilities, scoring near-perfect on graduate-level reasoning benchmarks.
content:
OpenAI unveiled GPT-5 today, marking what CEO Sam Altman called "the most significant leap in AI reasoning since the transformer architecture."

The model scored 96.3% on the GPQA Diamond benchmark, up from 84% with GPT-4o. More notably, it demonstrates what researchers call "deep reasoning" — the ability to break complex problems into sub-problems and self-correct during generation.

Early testers report the model excels at multi-step mathematical proofs, legal analysis, and scientific hypothesis generation. One researcher described it as "the difference between a student who memorized answers and one who truly understands the material."

The model will be available to ChatGPT Plus subscribers starting next week, with API access following in March.
